docs.snippet: The Scottish government said Tuesday that it will ask Britain's Supreme Court to block Prime Minister Theresa May from triggering European Union exit talks without consulting the Scottish Parliament first — another potential blow to May's ho...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Scottish government said Tuesday that it will ask Britain's Supreme Court to block Prime Minister Theresa May from triggering European Union exit talks without consulting the Scottish Parliament first — another potential blow to May's hopes of a quickie divorce from the bloc.

headline.main: Scotland Seeks to Block Brexit Talks Without Its Approval
headline.print_headline: Scotland Seeks to Block Brexit Talks Without Its Approval

docs.snippet: British interdealer broker Tullett Prebon Plc on Friday reported higher third-quarter revenue, boosted by a fall in the pound and volatility brought on by Britain's vote to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: British interdealer broker Tullett Prebon Plc on Friday reported higher third-quarter revenue, boosted by a fall in the pound and volatility brought on by Britain's vote to leave the European Union.

headline.main: Tullett Prebon Boosted by Sterling's Fall After Brexit Vote
headline.print_headline: Tullett Prebon Boosted by Sterling's Fall After Brexit Vote

docs.snippet: The White House on Thursday urged Britain and the European Union to ensure a flexible and smooth "Brexit" process after a British court ruled the government needed parliamentary approval to start the process of Britain leaving the EU....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House on Thursday urged Britain and the European Union to ensure a flexible and smooth "Brexit" process after a British court ruled the government needed parliamentary approval to start the process of Britain leaving the EU.

headline.main: White House Says EU, Britain Must Ensure Flexible 'Brexit' Process
headline.print_headline: White House Says EU, Britain Must Ensure Flexible 'Brexit' Process

docs.snippet: The four freedoms that underpin the European Union's internal market work together, EU Economic and Financial Affairs Commissioner Pierre Moscovici said on Friday when asked about negotiations with Britain about trade arrangements after its planne...
docs.lead_paragraph: The four freedoms that underpin the European Union's internal market work together, EU Economic and Financial Affairs Commissioner Pierre Moscovici said on Friday when asked about negotiations with Britain about trade arrangements after its planned exit from the EU.

headline.main: EU's Moscovici on Brexit: All Four Freedoms Work Together
headline.print_headline: EU's Moscovici on Brexit: All Four Freedoms Work Together

docs.snippet: British finance minister Philip Hammond said European leaders were unlikely to think only about the economic implications of Britain's decision to leave the European Union, saying the political impact would also probably have an impact....
docs.lead_paragraph: British finance minister Philip Hammond said European leaders were unlikely to think only about the economic implications of Britain's decision to leave the European Union, saying the political impact would also probably have an impact.

headline.main: Hammond Says Politics, Not Just Economics, to Steer Brexit Talks
headline.print_headline: Hammond Says Politics, Not Just Economics, to Steer Brexit Talks

docs.snippet: The head of major miner BHP Billiton says what Britain needs is a "hard-headed Brexit", which would maintain trade relations with the European Union and place the focus on minimising bureaucracy as much as on keeping tariffs low....
docs.lead_paragraph: The head of major miner BHP Billiton says what Britain needs is a "hard-headed Brexit", which would maintain trade relations with the European Union and place the focus on minimising bureaucracy as much as on keeping tariffs low.

headline.main: BHP Boss Calls for 'Hard-Headed Brexit' With Little Bureaucracy
headline.print_headline: BHP Boss Calls for 'Hard-Headed Brexit' With Little Bureaucracy

docs.snippet: Britain should not be allowed to cherry-pick its membership rules....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain should not be allowed to cherry-pick its membership rules.

headline.main: The E.U. Should Stick to Its Guns on Brexit
headline.print_headline: The E.U. Should Stick to Its Guns on Brexit

docs.snippet: Britain's biggest retailer, Tesco, settled a pricing row with Unilever after halting online sales of goods produced by the Anglo-Dutch giant in a dispute caused by a plunge in the pound since Britons voted to leave the EU....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's biggest retailer, Tesco, settled a pricing row with Unilever after halting online sales of goods produced by the Anglo-Dutch giant in a dispute caused by a plunge in the pound since Britons voted to leave the EU.

headline.main: Tesco, Unilever Settle Prices Row After Pound's Brexit Dive
headline.print_headline: Tesco, Unilever Settle Prices Row After Pound's Brexit Dive

docs.snippet: Ireland's finance minister unveiled his "Brexit-proof" budget on Tuesday, but business groups and the opposition said it failed to protect the economy from the likely impact of its main trading partner, Britain, quitting the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ireland's finance minister unveiled his "Brexit-proof" budget on Tuesday, but business groups and the opposition said it failed to protect the economy from the likely impact of its main trading partner, Britain, quitting the European Union.

headline.main: Ireland Unveils 'Brexit-Proof' Budget, Opposition Calls It 'Pathetic'
headline.print_headline: Ireland Unveils 'Brexit-Proof' Budget, Opposition Calls It 'Pathetic'

docs.snippet: Finland's euroskeptic foreign minister believes other states might follow Britain's lead and quit the European Union if authorities in Brussels press on with efforts to integrate member states more deeply....
docs.lead_paragraph: Finland's euroskeptic foreign minister believes other states might follow Britain's lead and quit the European Union if authorities in Brussels press on with efforts to integrate member states more deeply.

headline.main: Finland's Soini Tempers Anti-EU Rhetoric After Brexit Shock
headline.print_headline: Finland's Soini Tempers Anti-EU Rhetoric After Brexit Shock
